column4: Hello all.. i'm trying to set up an NFS share... have gone to system/administration/shared foldeers
the drop down for "share with" only shows SMB not NFS
any ideas what the problem is? on this machine, it prompted me to install NFS
you mount the shares as folders on your filesystem, though I myself am having problems getting the server to start sharing them in the first place
ah! oh ok.. :) good luck! i'll try that though
yeah, it's edit > preferences instead of tools > options
why does ubotu give the wiki links in https?
seems wierd to want an encrypted wiki to me :P
then again the one we have at work is encrypted but inaccessable outside of the local subnet
I've right clicked on the folder, "share folder" and it only allows me to select SMB
